actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Currency and Housing
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Currency and Housing.

official_title: A bill to permit the payment of interest on demand deposits which consist of public funds of the United States or of a State or political subdivision or instrumentality of a State.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Reserve Act to permit the payment of interest on demand deposits which consist of public funds of the United States or of a State or political subdivision or instrumentality of a State.

titles.title: A bill to permit the payment of interest on demand deposits which consist of public funds of the United States or of a State or political subdivision or instrumentality of a State.
